column5: This MSc in Environment and Energy covers a blend of scientific, technical, managerial and entrepreneurial topics such as the policies and regulations that impact on environmental management. Our aim is to prepare you for a career in the emerging energy and environmental sectors.You’ll focus on bioenergy production, utilisation and management, and general environmental management.You’ll improve your research skills and techniques by completing a dissertation on a topic you want to explore further, supported by our academic staff.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 Year Full Time / 2 Years Part Time
